labelsCvesButton: {cvesCount, plural, one {# CVE} other {# CVEs}} associated with this patch
labelsErrorDateLimit: Date is before the allowable range.
labelsErrorInvalidDate: The date should be valid of a type YYYY-MM-DD
notAuthorizedDescription: Contact your organization administrator(s) for more information.
notAuthorizedTitle: You do not have permissions to view or manage Patch
statesMinimumPatchPermissionsRequired: To view the content of this page, you must be granted a minimum of Patch permissions from your Organisation Administratior
statesNoSmartManagement: Create a content with Red Hat Smart Management
statesNoSmartManagementBody: Manage your infrastructure directly from console.redhat.com by controlling the scope of package and advisory updates to be installed on selected systems based on criteria you define, providing you with consistent content across environments and time from the console. {br} {br} Creating content templates from console.redhat.com is a premium feature only available with Red Hat Smart Management.
statesNoTemplateBody: You have not created any patch templates
statesSystemUpToDate: This system is up to date, based on package information submitted at the most recent system check-in
templateError: There was a problem processing the patch template. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact Red Hat support
templateNoSystemSelected: At least one system must be selected. Actions must be associated to a system to be added to a playbook.
templateTitleAssignSystem: Assign system(s) to a patch template
textEmptyStateBody: To continue, edit your filter settings and search again.
textLockVersionTooltip: Your RHEL version is locked at version {lockedVersion}
textPatchTemplatePending: Please allow a few minutes to set up a patch template. You will receive a notification when finished.
textPatchTemplateReview: Review the information below and click Submit to complete patch template creation
textTemplateReviewSystems: You will be able to adjust your selection anytime. A system can have only one patch template, therefore if you assign a new patch template to the system, it will be overwritten.
textTemplateSelectedSystems: You selected {systemsCount, plural, one { # system } other { # systems }}
textThirdPartyInfo: This system has content that is managed by repositories other than the Red Hat CDN
textUnassignSystemsStatement: Do you want to remove the {systemsCount, plural, one { # selected system } other { # selected systems }} from assigned Patch templates?
textUnassignSystemsWarning: There {systemsCount, plural, one {is # system } other { are # systems }} you are trying to remove that {systemsCount, plural, one {is} other {are}} not assigned to any existing Patch template. This action will not affect {systemsCount, plural, one {it} other {them}}.
viewPackagesAndErrata: View packages and errata at access.redhat.com
